allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix word cloud shape sync timing issues

- Add sync after setting properties in createWordCloudWordShapeEntries to avoid pending operations in shared context
- Batch shape creation in insertWordCloudWidget: create all shapes, sync, set properties, then sync again
- Prevents InvalidArgument errors when loading shapes with pending property changes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove TextBox fallback for word cloud bubbles

TextBox shapes don''t support fill colors and line formats, causing InvalidArgument errors when rendering. Only use geometric shapes \(Cloud, CloudCallout, RoundRectangle\) for bubbles since they support the required visual properties.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Load shape properties before modifying them after sync

After syncing newly created shapes, load their fill, lineFormat, and textFrame properties before attempting to modify them. This ensures the property objects are initialized and prevents InvalidArgument errors.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
